data.name: Gensokyo Odyssey Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: The full soundtrack of Gensokyo Odyssey composed by Kronington; over 30 tracks, unlooped, and over 90 minutes long.
data.about_the_game: The full soundtrack of Gensokyo Odyssey composed by Kronington; over 30 tracks, unlooped, and over 90 minutes long.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
